mapper.sql: id, sys_key, user_name, type, creator, modifier, create_time, modified_time
mapper.insert: insert into urc_system_administrator (id, sys_key, user_name, type, creator, modifier, create_time, modified_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into urc_system_administrator
id,
sys_key,
user_name,
type,
creator,
modifier,
create_time,
modified_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{sysKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update urc_system_administrator
sys_key = #{sysKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update urc_system_administrator set sys_key = #{sysKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into urc_system_administrator (sys_key, user_name, type, creator, modifier, create_time, modified_time) values
(#{item.sysKey}, #{item.userName}, #{item.type}, #{item.creator}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifiedTime})
on DUPLICATE key update modified_time=values(modified_time), modifier=values(modifier)
mapper.select: select distinct up.sys_key from urc_system_administrator usa inner join urc_permission up on up.sys_key = usa.sys_key and up.status = 1 where usa.user_name = #{userName} and usa.type = #{type}
